name: Keeping up with Recycling
description:
• Keeping up with the Recycling is a game I made for a game jam over the course of five days. The theme was the environment, and I waste sorting really clicked with me.
How to play:
  • Sort the waste in the correct bin (recyclable is the green one, hint, hint) and earn points. 
  • The recyclable waste is worth 2, while the non-recyclable is worth only one. I guess people who recycle are a bit better than everyone else, after all.
  • Do this while avoiding the adorable carpinchos (as they're called over here, some may call them capybaras, others may know them as Hydrochoerus hydrochaeris).
  • Seriously, don't step on them. That's really mean.
Controls:
  • Use the left and right arrows to move around
  • Up arrow is used for jumping
  • ESC is for pausing the game, as according to the sacred tradition
